Name: bradyopsia
Definition: A retinal disease characterized by the slower than usual adaptation of the eyes to changing light conditions; can have material basis in mutations in the RGS9 or the R9AP genes.

Name: cone dystrophy
Definition: A retinal disease that is characterized by the loss of cone cells

Name: enhanced S-cone syndrome
Definition: A retinal disease that is characterized by early onset night blindness

Name: chorioretinal scar
Definition: A parasitic ectoparasitic infectious disease that is caused by parasitic dipterous fly larvae (maggots) feeding on the host's necrotic or living tissue.

Name: hypertensive retinopathy
Definition: An arthritis that has_material_basis_in the accumulation of salt crystals located_in joint.

Name: retinopathy of prematurity
Definition: A cryptococcosis that is_a disease associated with AIDS has_material_basis_in Cryptococcus neoformans which results_in a systemic infection in individuals with HIV.

Name: angioid streaks
Definition: A vaginal cancer that has_material_basis in glandular tissue.

Name: rubeosis iridis
Definition: An eye disease that affects the lacrimal apparatus (the lacrimal gland and its related structures) which moisten and drain the eye.

Name: obsolete diabetes mellitus insulin dependent type
Definition: An eye disease that affects the lacrimal apparatus (the lacrimal gland and its related structures) which moisten and drain the eye.

Name: Leber congenital amaurosis
Definition: A retinal disease that is characterized by nystagmus

Name: retinal vascular disease
Definition: A blepharitis that is characterized by the dual combination of conjunctivitis with blepharitis.

Name: obsolete reactive confusion
Definition: A blepharitis that is characterized by the dual combination of conjunctivitis with blepharitis.

Name: retinitis
Definition: A breast adenocarcinoma in which at least one half of the tumor volume is extracellular mucin throughout.

Name: retinal cancer
Definition: An epidermolysis bullosa that is characterized by recurrent blistering at the level of the epidermis secondary to minor trauma

Name: retinal detachment
Definition: A fallopian tube cancer that derives_from germ cells.

Name: obsolete retinal detachment and defect
Definition: A fallopian tube cancer that derives_from germ cells.
Synonym: Unspecified retinal detachment with retinal defect (disorder)

Name: nerve fibre bundle defect
Definition: An extragonadal germ cell cancer that are located_in the pineal gland in the brain

Name: retinal edema
Definition: A benign perivascular tumor that is characterized as a vascular variant of a glomus tumor.

Name: macular holes
Definition: A male reproductive organ cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells and is_located_in the Cowper's gland.

Name: retinal degeneration
Definition: A retinal disease that is characterized by deterioration of the retina caused by the progressive and eventual death of the cells of the retina.

Name: obsolete Retinoschisis and retinal cysts
Definition: A retinal disease that is characterized by deterioration of the retina caused by the progressive and eventual death of the cells of the retina.

Name: night blindness
Definition: An interstitial lung disease that is characterized by the development of pleuroparenchymal disease secondary to rheumatoid arthritis
